faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about our services and process
faq.q1: How long does a typical blockchain project take?
faq.a1: Project timelines vary depending on complexity. Simple smart contracts take 2-4 weeks, while complex DeFi protocols typically require 3-6 months. We provide detailed timelines during our initial consultation.
faq.q2: Do you provide post-launch support and maintenance?
faq.a2: Yes, we offer comprehensive post-launch support including bug fixes, security updates, feature additions, and 24/7 monitoring. Support packages are customized based on your project needs.
faq.q3: What blockchain networks do you support?
faq.a3: We specialize in Ethereum, BSC, Polygon, Solana, Avalanche, and Fantom. We also work with other EVM-compatible chains and can recommend the best network based on your project requirements and budget.
faq.q4: How do you ensure security in blockchain projects?
faq.a4: Security is our top priority. We follow best practices including comprehensive testing, formal verification, third-party audits, and continuous monitoring. All our smart contracts undergo rigorous security reviews before deployment.
faq.q5: Can you work with existing blockchain projects?
faq.a5: Absolutely! We can audit, optimize, upgrade, or extend existing blockchain projects. We also provide consulting services to help improve performance, security, and functionality of current implementations.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Project?
